articles.author: Nektaria Stamouli, Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Explosion rocks Odesa near where Zelenskyy was meeting Greek PM - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: A ballistic missile blast occurred just a few hundred meters away from the leaders’ motorcade.
articles.content:
Authorities are investigating the cause of the blast. Odesa has been under Russian fire since the start of Moscow’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine in February 2022.
